amendment.description: Amendment provides performance based measures, including crosscut budgeting, adaptive management and an Independent Evaluator, to assure that federal dollars currently spent on Chesapeake Bay restoration activities will produce results.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 54 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to provide performance based measures, including crosscut budgeting, adaptive management and an Independent Evaluator, to assure that federal dollars currently spent on Bay restoration activities will produce results.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Wittman.
